name: ICS 162 Final Project
description:
This is a Final Project for the ICS 162 (Modelling and World Building) at the University of California, Irvine.

Purpose of this short game is to present 3D Models and the gameplay is about 5 minutes (if you get lost in the cave LOL).  

Third-Party Assets include: the skybox, terrain tools sample asset pack and the boat. Textures are from Google or included from the asset pack.

3D Models developed in Blender 2.79
